"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": ""}]}, {"type": "block_quote", "children": [{"text": "Department of Skills, Employment and Entrepreneurship -", "bold": true}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "Organize employment fairs/ camps and ensure participation of such employers who provide employment opportunities in the form of work-from-home-job work. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "If a private unit provides work from home - job work to women and the payment for the work given to the woman is more than \u20b9 5,000, then \u20b9 3,000 per trainee will be given as a training incentive, as a training fee. However, the payment of the training incentive amount will be given to the female trainee only after the offer letter is given by the private entity in the form of work from home- job work.
